Record.ClassificationPath: Immune System Diseases/Immunologic Deficiency Syndromes/Phagocyte Bactericidal Dysfunction
Hemic and Lymphatic Diseases/Hematologic Diseases/Leukocyte Disorders/Phagocyte Bactericidal Dysfunction
Record.Description: Disorders in which phagocytic cells cannot kill ingested bacteria; characterized by frequent recurring infection with formulation of granulomas.
